text:
After a discussion with Andreas:
Dashes etc. interfere with custom DocumentBuilders, so we could transfer the
method to the DocumentBuilder interface (move the signature from DocumentManager
to DocumentBuilder, and the implementation from DocumentManagerImpl to
DefaultDocumentBuilder; update the reference)
creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com

text:
I moved the method from DocumentManager to DocumentBuilder. This avoids
interference between language suffix separators and document IDs. The
DefaultDocumentBuilder allows dashes now. Thanks for the patch!
creator: andreas@apache.org
